name: Under the Redwood Motel
description:
Made in 10 days as a part of Scream Jam 2020!

The very first horror game with rhythm elements: enemies will make noise that disguises your footsteps, allowing you to sneak by.

Your father - who you escaped decades ago - owned a small motel just outside town. It was unremarkable, so when the old road it sat upon fell into disrepair it was easily forgotten. His resentment grew as the years went by with almost no guests. A soul so vile it began to manifest in horrific physical ways. You receive a letter from your father, taunting you. Daring you to return and find him underneath the Redwood Motel.

DinosaurAfterlife is a group of three people who came together with a shared vision:

To make something for this jam.

And that vision is now fulfilled, so we no longer have a vision and would appreciate a newer, longer lasting one.
